mapper.sql: phone_number, file_name, description, teacher_name, school_name, subject_name, stage_name, teacher_id, qiniu_url, time, chapter, section, article, questions_name, chapter_id, status, last_update_time, approve_system_name, approve_system_id, approve_desc,custom_list_id,group_id
mapper.update:
update entrust_upload
last_update_time = now(),
status = #{status.code},
approve_desc = #{approve_desc},
approve_system_name = #{approve_system_name},
approve_system_id = #{approve_system_id},
custom_list_id=#{cusDirId},
group_id=#{groupId}
id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into entrust_upload (phone_number, file_name, description, teacher_name, school_name, subject_name, stage_name, teacher_id, qiniu_url, time, chapter, section, article, questions_name, chapter_id, status, last_update_time, approve_system_name, approve_system_id, approve_desc, directory_id, topic_ids,custom_list_id,group_id ) values ( #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teacherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{qiniuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chapter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{questionsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chapterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{approveSystemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{approveSystemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{approveDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{directoryId}, #{topicIds},#{customListId},#{groupId})

insert into entrust_upload (phone_number, file_name, description, teacher_name, school_name, subject_name, stage_name, teacher_id, qiniu_url, time, chapter, section, article, questions_name, chapter_id, status, last_update_time, approve_system_name, approve_system_id, approve_desc ) values
( #{item.phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.teacherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.schoolName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.stageName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.teacherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.qiniuUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.chapter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.article,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.questionsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.chapterId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{item.lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.approveSystemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.approveSystemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.approveDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
